u.a: CHI immediately sits on car and KIM wanders around room investigating items . CHI climbs off car and gets snake from sofa this and the next two utterances , holds it toward KIM and makes snake noises as KIM tries o avoid snake by moving away and not saying anything . gettinq no reaction , CHI discontinues snake attack and moves to car and quietly turns wheel . KIM investigates suitcase . no visual interaction .
CHI turns and watches KIM struggling with suitcase .
CHI climbs on sofa .
CHI says this , as if to self for CHI has back to KIM . unclear what he has had enough of .

CHI picks up fish and moves it toward KIM again , mumbling "fish , fish , fish , " and she backs off once more , smiling slightly . CHI laughs but then not getting a good play reaction , abandons fish and jets ironing board and iron . KIM is busy with tool belt . CHI sets up ironing board directly beside KIM and vigorously irons , frequently looking at her , but KIM ignores . CHI again gives up and moves to oven , while KIM takes over ironing board and watches what CHI is doing . both play independently for few minutes . when CHI spills all pots and pans out of oven , KIM turns to see what the noise was and stares for a minutes .
CHI asks this with direct gaze .
KIM answers this with direct gaze and CHI seems confused , not saying anything , scratching his head and watching KIM set tools out on couch .
KIM leaves tools , goes to car , and begins to get on but CHI immediately jumps to claim it .
CHI says this in commanding voice , climbing onto car and shoving KIM off .

CHI firmly establishes identity here turning wheel with gruff , serious expression . KIM backs away without comment . KIM picks up telephone , CHI watches her all the while . KIM sits on magnifying glass and makes phone call without speaking .
CHI , pointing to other phone on floor , as if in request that KIM pick it up and give it to him .
still holding phone to head , KIM points to phone CHI mentioned .
in reaction to previous , KIM asks of telephone she has in hand .
CHI deliberately points to one lying on floor , KIM gets up and picks up other phone obediently and puts it on car fcr CHI and sits down again .
CHI seems pleased and takes up receiver .
KIM attempts a mutual phone conversation , but CHI is too busy dialing , so KIM puts phone down and moves off camera .
CHI talks on phone , watching KIM play with truck .
CHI instructs KIM concerning something with the truck .
CHI instructs KIM concerning something with the truck .
KIM thinks she knows what she is doing .
CHI agrees .
CHI mumbles this while hanging up phone .
adamantly states this , shoving phone onto floor .
CHI kneels on car and seriously turns wheel .
KIM thinks he means the truck she is playing with this and CHI looks immediately and corrects here , pointing to the respective "vehicles ."

CHI pretends to take handfuls of the car into his mouth , constantly looking at KIM and smiling , trying together to act silly as_well but quits when he gets no reaction , turns steering wheel , intently watching kim's play .
CHI climbs off car when KIM goes to door and repeats this .
KIM coyly demands this but moves away from door , sits on magnifying glass and sucks thumb , seemingly content that door remains locked .
CHI gets immediate affirmitive response and nod of head to his question .
CHI accepts her assertion of ownership and says this knowingly .
KIM gets up and lays her hands on car testing to see how much CHI will admit to being hers after the previous two .
CHI hurries over and climbs on car , claiming it and KIM moves away .
CHI points to center of steering wheel as if his name were written there .
KIM consents , CHI continues rather frustrated .
KIM answers this , becoming frustrated herself .
CHI vigorously turns wheel and seems to be explaining what he is doing .
when he notices KIM go to door .
KIM is persistent and keeps trying door but soon gives up and walks over to sofa .
CHI still turning wheel and watching KIM , then gazes off distractedly . KIM irons vigorously for a few seconds , then goes to suitcase and looks inside .
CHI hears noise and turns around and gets off car and moves to KIM and asks this
repeats when no reply was forthcoming .
with head in suitcase , KIM mumbles without turning to CHI .
CHI requests clarification and perhaps a glance .
KIM repeats a little louder .
KIM is not loud enough for CHI to hear this .
KIM continues answering quietly with head in suitcase .
after this , KIM leaves suitcase
KIM moves away , explaining that just because it is not hers doesn't mean that it is his .
KIM goes to car but CHI quickly rushes over and jumps on car , roughly saying this ,
CHI "drives" while talking to KIM . KIM , with fingers in mouth , quietly watches .

CHI is talking just for the sake of talking while he has kim's full attention . at this KIM moves to cradle and takes doll out . CHI at first follows her with glance but then concentrates on driving .
KIM goes to couch feeds baby and then walks in front of car as if showing off and elicits this .
with back to CHI , KIM answers promptly and politely , still feeding the baby .
CHI points to ironing board and asks this ,
KIM follows pointing finger , thinks for a minute ,
then KIM gladly allows CHI to have it , while standing beside ironing board .
CHI gets off car and moves over to take closer look at doll .
KIM answers promptly here , with direct gaze .
CHI irons and KIM pushes him away and places baby on board .
CHI moves away and shows KIM iron he still holds in hand , and objects to the fact that baby is on board .
KIM explains that she must change the ironing board into a basinet .
CHI observes with great interest and after long pause asks this .
KIM quietly informs him with this , while busy handling baby .
CHI persists in telling her that the iron belongs on the ironing board and not the baby , probably jealous because he doesn't have a baby , .
KIM repeats with emphasis .
CHI quietly asks .
KIM refuses .
she interprets previous as a prohibition to her , but continues dressing doll and asserts this .
CHI continues quietly shaking head .
this is louder and assertive . CHI picks up fish from sofa , still watching with great interest what KIM is doing with doll .
CHI introjects , is he referring to iron , which he still holds .
he gets no reaction and repeats this .
gives up , puts iron down and walks to oven . KIM hears him , puts doll down and goes over and moves in on lunch box full of plates that CHI was busy with .
CHI leaves her to plates , puts something on car and exclaims this as if it were a revelation , pointing finger in air .
CHI picks up phone and says something inaudible .
holding phone in air asks this with direct gaze .
KIM answers quickly and moves away .
CHI asks this .
KIM answers from off camera .
CHI requests confirmation as if in disbelief here .
KIM answers enthusiastically .
CHI asks with direct gaze , pointing to other telephone , lying on floor beside him .
KIM requests repetition here .
kimgets repetition .
KIM responds appropriately .
CHI requests confirmation here . gets confirmation here
CHI gets confirmation here plus some inaudible mumbling .
CHI says this with enthusiasm into phone .
CHI hangs up and says this to self and picks up other telephone .
KIM comments to herself as she is busy "setting table" on car .
CHI has pretend conversation into other phone and hangs up .
KIM meticulously places plates on car and says this to self .
CHI relates phone message to KIM in loud , clear voice , with direct gaze .
KIM continues setting table here , ignoring roy's proclamation after short glance .
CHI gets up to help with table and holds out cups and saucers helpfully .
KIM ignores roy's help and continues placing "silverware" around table here , while CHI looks on .
CHI sets cup and saucer on table himself .
KIM continues arranging and kneels down beside car .
CHI kneels down also .
KIM sits quietly for a minute until CHI says this loudly , probably mispronouncing "cook" and gets up and goes to oven .
KIM agrees , goes to oven , and picks up pots pans and pours food onto plates and mumbles this to herself , and sits down and begins eating .
CHI busies himself with oven utensils and says this to self .
CHI puts plate on table and goes back to oven .
KIM retrieves cup from near sofa and places it carefully on table .
CHI finishes sentence KIM interrupted with this and sits down to table with plate in hand .
KIM continues preparations .
CHI mumbles this .

then KIM mumbles this . both sit down while KIM serves and begin to "cut up" food and to place it in mouth . CHI watches KIM intently and then imitates cutting activity . KIM looks up from her plate at CHI and says this , somewhat horrified at his bad manners .
KIM serves more to both .
KIM asks this .
CHI jumps up and gets some more off stove , and brings it to table . KIM asks for more CHI puts pan down and KIM takes lid off pan and "pours" onto her own plate .

now that independent preparations are finished , both concentrate on the meal . kim's attention is focused on keeping plates full of food and seeing that CHI behaves correctly , while CHI is content with this play scene , often giggling , always watching KIM for cues . KIM even gets up and comes over to his side to serve him .
CHI laughs . KIM goes around car to get another pot and serves CHI from it also .
KIM goes to oven to get more coffee CHI quietly sits , enjoys being served , commenting . KIM is busy taking things out of oven , but asks directly for roy's appreciation
still at oven , KIM is determined to get an answer from CHI . CHI stands looking at KIM but doesn't answer .
KIM comes from oven back to car with pan in hand , still asking this .
CHI finally answers .
both sit down at "table" again and CHI points to pocket on his pants and proudly proclaims this .
KIM is terribly interested and gets up and walks over to see his pocket .
CHI stands up to show her and KIM searches for her own pockets
CHI returns to her side of table and puts down utensils she had in her hand .
KIM pulls out play watch and attempts to put it on her wrist .
CHI is amazed and interested . CHI continues using same figure of speech as used before and asks enthusiastially .
KIM misunderstands CHI .
KIM answers this .
CHI stares up at wall and repeats this without any apparent reason .
KIM stands up to put watch back in pocket and returns to meal .
CHI asks KIM to correct him if he holds knife incorrectly .
KIM gladly corrects him here , puts her hand down and tells him to eat .
KIM gets up and serves some more and CHI giggles .
KIM goes back to own side and asks this .
CHI smiles and answers .
KIM cautions here , then corrects CHI manually by putting his hand down .
KIM puts serving pot down and stands by table and begins to clap hands rhythmically , soliciting CHI to follow suit .
CHI gets up and imitates KIM , having great fun , clapping simultaneously .
CHI gets up and imitates KIM , having great fun , clapping simultaneously .
